overview_description.description: Atelier Reform is an innovative startup with a social vocation, aimed at making the fashion industry more sustainable through circular economy and creativity. They collect used clothes, give them new value through tailoring and resell them. They ensure the transparency of the destination of the garment to those who donated it and inform the buyer about the positive impact on the environment that they had through their purchase. They are actively engaged in innovation and research and development activities, thanks to partnerships with other companies.
